:::Andromeda:::

::She sighed. every time she explains it, the story is more painful::
Andromeda: He transforms into a lizard, and it definatly shows through in his 
robot mode.  He has a big nose.  He used to be a Predacon General, and has 
the power to disguise his energy signature.  He killed my family, and my 
friends, destroyed my home, all for revenge that i didnt want to love him.
::She briefly sobs at this part::
Andromeda: How and why can you help?(for one, i want this to be a bigger 
batle than just my characters and him) Well, he has a weakness, and that is 
numbers.  I think if there are enough of us we can take him down.
